intro: Ultramarines Legion armies gain 12 formation points (F/p), 14 upgrade points (U/p), 4 Titan points (T/p), and 4 Ally points (A/p) for a normal sized battle. A negative U/p value means that you gain that many upgrade points for taking a particular formation.
strategy: Legiones Astartes armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: All Legiones Astartes Detachments and Collegia Titanica Allied Banners have an initiative of 1+. Legio Cybernetica Maniples have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Cybernetica Cortex' special rule. Solar Auxilia Allied Sections have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Army of Mankind' special rule. Questoris Familia Allied Lances have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Chivalry' special rule.
armyRules: The And They Shall Know No Fear special rule applies to all Ultramarines Legion Detachments.
specialRules: And They Shall Know No Fear

formations.name: Tactical Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Legion Tactical Squads
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian (1 U/p), or with a Praetor (0-1 in the army, 2 U/p)
Replace two Legion Tactical Squads with two Legion Support Squads (1 U/p), or two Legion Heavy Support Squads (2 U/p)

Add two Legion Tactical Squads (2 U/p), two Legion Support Squads (2 U/p), two Contemptor Dreadnoughts of any single configuration (2 U/p), two Cataphractii Terminator Squads (3 U/p), or two Legion Heavy Support Squads (3 U/p)
